archimate:Requirement.name: 4.60.3 IAM Methods control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Identity and access management arrangements should provide a consistent set of methods for: identifying users (e.g. using unique User IDs) authenticating users (e.g. using pass-words/passphrases, tokens or bio-metrics) identifying equipment (e.g. by using MAC-based authentication) applying user sign-on processes authorising user access privileges administering user access privileges.
